<soapenv:Body> <com:createOrUpdateASAEL> <com:asael> <asa:asaelAgent> <com:agent> <name>Calcium carbonate</name> <descriptionText>Calcium carbonate is a dietary supplement used when the amount of calcium taken in the diet is not enough.</descriptionText> <nscNumber>725280</nscNumber> </com:agent> <asa:expectedAECtcTerm> <ctepTerm>Nausea</ctepTerm> <ctepCode>100288131</ctepCode> <category>Gastrointestinal disorders</category> <ctcVersion>4</ctcVersion> <status>IN</status> </asa:expectedAECtcTerm> <asa:expectedAECtcTerm> <ctepTerm>Anal pain</ctepTerm> <ctepCode>10002167</ctepCode> <category>Gastrointestinal disorders</category> <ctcVersion>4</ctcVersion> <status>IN</status> </asa:expectedAECtcTerm> <status>IN</status> </asa:asaelAgent> </com:asael> </com:createOrUpdateASAEL> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
